finishRunSend.subject: Amazon Parser - attached report

Hello,

Execution has been completed. Find file in attachment.

inputFileNotFound.subject: Amazon Parser - file invalid
inputFileNotFound.body:
Hello,

No input file was available at the time of the run. Please place input file for next run.
